title: How to protect from  Brute Force And DDOS Attacks
description:
Type : PDF 
Pages : 23 

Although distributed denial of service and brute force attacks are relatively simple strategies for attackers to implement, they can wreak havoc on your organization if you donâ€™t understand how to detect and respond to them appropriately. In this paper weâ€™ll explore both types of attacks and provide guidance on what you should do if you encounter one. 

You'll read about: 

-Different types of DDoS and brute force attacks 
-How to identify DDoS and brute force attacks 
-DDoS and brute force attack response options 
-The future of DDoS and brute force attacks
